data.text: @jonherochung @KerriBerriKerri @TLHM_MD @LucyModahlMD That makes us fellow “fellow alumni” then! I’d shoot you a DM but I believe your privacy settings probably only allow people you follow to message you as you’re not pulling up when I search for you.

@KerriBerriKerri @scott_matson @TLHM_MD @LucyModahlMD Hey, @scott_matson, you are from NJH/U CO; so we are fellow alumni (sort of) as I think of my 5 years at NJH as a second fellowship of sorts. Now I have no choice but to help you.
@KerriBerriKerri @scott_matson @TLHM_MD @LucyModahlMD I'm always willing to help to push forward. DM me.
